title: Remove my low priority queue Becouse i did leave.
body: Well look i never left a match ..... every time i out from match is becouse a bug tells me you are dissconeccted and tells me to exit .... so i have no other choice right ??? Why shuld i get low priority queue ???? Well is not out fault that lol have bug and from that bug we get low priority queue ... Please remove my low priority queue ... my name in lol FadiRD server north amirca .... and please remove this bugg .... league of legends is my life drugs .. Please Help Your Players !!{{champion:157}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3072}} {{sticker:galio-happy}}

replies.body:
This doesn't sound like a bug, but possibly a network problem struggling to keep you connected to the game server.  Even if the leave was not intentional, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all leaves equally because it still causes others a negative experience.  

You'll want to run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this, and troubleshoot in a custom game to prevent further penalties.  Let me know if that clears things up!
your match making is unfair i had 2 games 4v5 in my promos how is that fair? how can someone climb?
Dude i i won so match match 3 vs 5 ._. maybe you guys lost becouse you guys noobs.
So is not my fault !! i can not controll internet !! dont put me in low priority becouse some thing i didn't do it !!! not fair
